Summary: Flashing reflective craft the size of a helicopter descended and then disappeared
divs: sighting detailsstopped in traffic on westbound i-80 at longview dr. at 9:12 am 9-20-2012. couldn't figure out why traffic wasn't moving. i looked up and saw a fluttering, flashing object the size of a large helicopter over north sacramento - descended to approximately 200 feet - traffic started to move - i looked up again and it had disappeared. no shape to the object, just flashing\reflective light - moving in erratic pattern.
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There was one other sighting in Sacramento on or around September 20th 2012
